ai-enhancement/implementation.title: AI Implementation Guide
ai-enhancement/implementation.description: This guide provides practical advice for implementing AI enhancements in the Pokemon TCG Simulator. It covers the technical aspects of integrating AI into the existing codebase.

ai-enhancement/integration.title: AI Integration Guide
ai-enhancement/integration.description: This guide provides a high-level overview of how to integrate AI into the Pokemon TCG Simulator. It focuses on the architectural considerations and integration points rather than the implementation details.

ai-enhancement/opportunities.title: AI Enhancement Opportunities
ai-enhancement/opportunities.description: The Pokemon TCG Simulator provides numerous opportunities for AI enhancement. This document outlines key areas where AI can be integrated to improve gameplay, provide assistance, and create challenging opponents.

architecture/client-side.title: Client-Side Architecture
architecture/client-side.description: The client-side of the Pokemon TCG Simulator is built with JavaScript and follows a modular structure. This document provides an overview of the client-side architecture.

architecture/overview.title: System Architecture Overview
architecture/overview.description: The Pokemon TCG Simulator is built with a client-server architecture that enables real-time multiplayer gameplay. This document provides a high-level overview of the system architecture.

architecture/server-side.title: Server-Side Architecture
architecture/server-side.description: The server-side of the Pokemon TCG Simulator is built with Node.js, Express, and Socket.IO. This document provides an overview of the server-side architecture.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.description: Welcome to the Pokemon TCG Simulator documentation. This documentation provides a comprehensive overview of the simulator's architecture and identifies opportunities for AI enhancement.
